Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Y'know...<sp:5:1:0>you look an awful lot like
Master Kohga's archenemy, Link!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Or at least your blasted blond hair does!
Listen, you do know why we wear
uniforms, right? To look UNIFORM!
When you think of the Yiga Clan emerging
from the shadows, you think of them as
a fearsome, largely identical unit!
I mean, yeah, OK, some of us are a bit
bulkier than others, but that Link-like hair
of yours sticks out like a sore thumb!
<snd:Angry_00>So, y'know what? I'm not gonna let you
in here! At least, not until you learn how
to fall in line!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive_01>Get yourself to our training ground on top
of that tower.

They'll teach you how to act right!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughBad>Make it through our training, and I guess
I'll let you in.

If you come back alive, that is!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionAngry>Listen, fancy-pants! Those golden locks of
yours stand out. We Yiga are supposed to
